com.c301t3.c301t3app

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.c301t3.c301t3app.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by Henry on 23/02/18. Class for that represents a Task, which contains data for its name, description, status, price, and bids from others.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Henry
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
